history.text: hello
Hi have you seen the blind side? Critics praised Sandra Bullock's performance
I love that movie! I thought Sandra was fantastic in her performance
What did you think of her performance?
I thought it was wonderful! Even though some viewers thought the overall acting was bland Sandra Bullock's performance was especially strong
I thought Tim Mcgraw was also realy good in that movie
he was and the source material was also very strong
thought it had a good meaning
same. you should rewatch it to see if you agree with some of the moderate reviews from critics
I dont know what they didnt like
do you normally watch movies that are critically aclaimed?
not normally. I am not a big movie lover. I watch more tv shows.
I dont know as much about tv shows. Do you remember the scene where Michael Oher runs away from home?
Yeah. I thought something bad might happen at that point
me too. but then his friend's father helped him join the football team
he was a dominant player
I like the sean where he befriended Sean Jr
because it showed lots of emotional range
true
do you remember the seen where Leigh Anne's friends thought she might not be safe with Michael?
Yeah all because he was a male and because of his race
True. I enjoyed the scene where Leigh Anne found out that Michael had high protective instincts as it tied together the family elements and the football elements of the movie
And how she went on the football field to show him
i was disturbed by the scene where Michael returned to his home town and almost joined a gang from home
that was scary
but i enjoyed how michael made the right decision, it showed his depth of character
i just accidentally returned my hit so im leaving

uid1response.feedback: the user left the chat and returned the hit
